itemDescription: Data Model for data from WiFi HotSpots deployed in Pune City

dataModelSchema.describes: Data model for WiFi Hotspots installed in Pune City

HOTSPOT_ID.describes: Hotspot ID as per the device data model

LASTUPDATEDATETIME.describes: Time when the last data was received from this device

DOWNLOAD_RATE.describes: Aggregate Download Rate for the hotspot location. It is a number encoded as a string. The units should be interpreted after convert 'string' type to 'number' type

ACCESS_POINT_COUNT.describes: Number of WiFi Access points associated with the hotspot. It is an integer encoded as a string.

UPLOAD_RATE.describes: Aggregate upload rate for the hotspot location. It is a number encoded as a string. The units should be interpreted after convert 'string' type to 'number' type

USER_COUNT.describes: Number of users connected to the hotspot. It is an integer encoded as a string.
